thread.title: Bill Clinton Tweets About Hillary During Las Vegas Debate
thread.title_full: Bill Clinton Tweets About Hillary During Las Vegas Debate

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Bill Clinton Tweets About Hillary During Las Vegas Debate
text:
What happens in Vegas...is I watch @HillaryClinton prove she's the most qualified candidate for POTUS. #ImWithHer pic.twitter.com/ax1d56Whwt
— Bill Clinton (@billclinton) October 14, 2015
 Bill Clinton, who might one day become the first First Gentleman of America, tweeted a message of support from a Las Vegas hotel room while his wife, Hillary, dominated the first Democratic presidential debate of the year.
Hillary, a former senator and secretary of the state, is currently the Democratic front-runner, and if elected, she will become the first female president of the United States. Whether you're a Clinton fan or not, you have to admit the tweet was cute.
Follow Prachi on Twitter . ​
